original_text: He measured also the vestibule, sixty cubits. And around the vestibule of the gateway was the court.
korean_text: 그가 또 현관을 측량하니 너비가 스무 척이요 현관 사방에 뜰이 있으며

sentences.original_text: And around the vestibule of the gateway was the court
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성문 현관의 주위에는 뜰이 있었다
